name: Horse Robot Transformation
description:
US police robot horse transformation is a gift for you, transform ultimate mighty robot to police motorcycle or a metal horse and ride the horse around the futuristic robot city to fulfill your urge of wild horse riding games. Remember, this is not just a riding horse game, here people of the futuristic city are being tortured by the enemy fighter robots. You need to take full control of your police flying robot horse and fly around the city to spot the robotic enemy, Shoot them with your heavy machine guns and missiles; bombard them in a way they cannot be fixed again in this best of flying horse transformation robot shooting fighting police games. During the US robot fighting game you can transform robot horse in transforming robot bike and drift through the city streets in search of the evil Miami gangsters to enjoy this finest of horse robot motorcycle bike shooting and motor bike driving games.


This is a new kind of animal US robot war flying bike game where multi robots are coming from alien planets to finish the human race, you being the US police robot commando will be reporting for duty in multi robot transformation disguise. Transform robot to a shooting bike or into a jet airplane like flying horse, your ultimate responsibility is to protect the lives of innocent civilians and finish the evil robots who are try to invade the planet earth. Counter attack the monster robots and multi robot transform in a disguise of your choice to ace US police cop robot shooting games offline.


***US Robot Police Horse Robot Flying Transformation Game Features***

- Extreme action for fans for police shooting and robot horse fighting games
- Realistic transformation of flying robot horse and transforming robot bike
- Thrilling game play with easy controls for kids
- Real moto bike racing for fans of bike driving games for free
